note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2011 prices. Earnings are defined as in-cash and in-kind payments to employees at regular intervals, for time worked or work done together with remuneration for time not worked, such as annual vacation, other types of paid leave, or holidays.
title: Average hourly earnings of male and female employees
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.

display.name: Average hourly earnings of employees, men
Average hourly earnings of employees, women
